snippet.title: Open Carry: Veteran Unlawfully Disarmed, Detained & Arrested | OnTheMoveShow

localized.description:
In this video Mack is unlawfully disarmed, detained and arrested by Police for Open Carry. Mack is fighting this in court. Donate here to help: http://OnTheMoveShow.com/donate.html

Mack was unlawfully arrested on 29 June 2013 in Vancouver, WA and has been battling ever since. Mack Worley is a veteran of the United States Air Force. He honorably served his country for almost 6 years before being medically retired. Mack is a Political Talk Show Host (http://Spreaker.com/onthemoveshow), a You Tube Personality (http://youtube.com/OnTheMoveShow), a Blogger (http://onthemoveshow.blogspot.com), a Citizen Journalist and an Activist. 

-----------------

Mack's interview w/ Open Carry Vancouver on his unlawful arrest:

Part 1: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g_L9Fe99qfA&feature=share&list=PLASYhfR96j_6zd3NKThOJIJ88sydb7Ooe
Part 2: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CfNm8k67hrg&feature=share&list=PLASYhfR96j_6zd3NKThOJIJ88sydb7Ooe

-----------------

website: http://www.OnTheMoveShow.com
